name: Holy Trinity
uniques: [+5 Culture, +5 Happiness, +5 Gold, +5 Faith, +5 Production, +5 Food, +5 Science]from [All] tiles [in all cities]

name: Mandir
uniques: May buy [Mandir] buildings with [Faith] [in cities following this religion]

name: Synagogue
uniques: May buy [Synagogue] buildings with [Faith] [in cities following this religion]

name: God is King
uniques: [Palace] provides [+1 Culture, +1 Faith, +1 Gold, +1 Production, and +1 Science]

name: Sun and Tears of God
uniques: [+1 Food]  for each [Bananas], [Citrus], [Wheat]. [+2 Faith] for each [Gems], and [Pearls] resources

name: Secured Life
uniques: [+2 Happiness] for every [6] global followers [in non-enemy foreign cities], [+40]% attacking Strength for cities
